markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Tracker's Goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=467)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These lenses of forest-green glass are bound in rough leather stitched with crude twine. While wearing these goggles, you gain a +1 bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction and Track. If you fail a check to Track, you can try again after 30 minutes rather than an hour. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tracker's Goggles
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tracker's Goggles (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 660 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The goggles grant a +2 bonus. If you fail a check to Track, you can try again after 15 minutes rather than an hour.
name: Tracker's Goggles
